summary.para: Installs an application published by an application publisher, while preventing multiple windows from being active on the same thread.

param.name: hwndParent
param.para: A handle to the parent window.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the interface by providing an additional installation method.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
